CustomField.description: The new Prospect-Client Number for the client. If the client record does not have a BIS Id, this value will be set on the Prospect-Client record. If the client record does have a BIS Id, this will not be updated on the Prospect-Client record until updated by the integration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the format: location number â€“ client number or lll-cccccccc, drop any leading zeroes from the location number. Enter the Core Advanced client number in the New Prospect-Client Number field.
CustomField.label: New Prospect-Client Number
